Methods in org.opends.sdk that return SimpleBindRequest

 SimpleBindRequest SimpleBindRequest.clearControls()
          Removes all the controls included with this request.
static SimpleBindRequest Requests.newSimpleBindRequest()
          Creates a new simple bind request having an empty name and password suitable for anonymous authentication.
static SimpleBindRequest Requests.newSimpleBindRequest(String name)
          Creates a new simple bind request having the provided name and an empty password suitable for unauthenticated authentication.
static SimpleBindRequest Requests.newSimpleBindRequest(String name, ByteString password)
          Creates a new simple bind request having the provided name and password suitable for name/password authentication.
static SimpleBindRequest Requests.newSimpleBindRequest(String name, String password)
          Creates a new simple bind request having the provided name and password suitable for name/password authentication.
 SimpleBindRequest SimpleBindRequest.setName(String dn)
          Sets the distinguished name of the Directory object that the client wishes to bind as.
 SimpleBindRequest SimpleBindRequest.setPassword(ByteString password)
          Sets the password of the Directory object that the client wishes to bind as.
 SimpleBindRequest SimpleBindRequest.setPassword(String password)
          Sets the password of the Directory object that the client wishes to bind as.
